page.title: 12ST. JOHN'S CHURCH
page.content: {William Oliver Colt}built the{church . It was finished on 25th of October 1855 so now the church is 130 years old . The{West}door is not used now but now a large{0ak}one is used for the entrance . The{font}is 17th century and comes from{Malta . }It is made from{wood , stone}and{marble.} They moved it by the new door. All of the wood in the church is{Oak} and that includes the two rows of 29{pews. There are 7 bells in the bell tower but now 6 of them are rusted up so only 1 is used. The first time they were all used was in 1889. The{stained {glass windows}come from{Flanders}and the{alter}came from{Italy. { { { {
